author: ant osullivan
comment: Great for tennis, turn off ambient mode so you don't have to double swipe to add a score(will consume more battery)

author: Paul Štutas
comment: Cool app but the buttons for Undo and Reset don't get registered on Moto 360 2nd gen watch. Would be great to have score reset option in the settings - now I have to restart the app each time.

author: Петър Петров
comment: The app is simple and works fine but is there a way to store the match results for future reference?

reply.author: PumpkinTechLabs
reply.content: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback. We are working on this feature for one of the future releases. We will let you know when it becomes available.

author: z28 camaro
comment: Payed and was unable to use my s2 smart watch. There are no intructions. 2.99 i spend fpr nothing !

reply.author: PumpkinTechLabs
reply.content: Unfortunately this app is not compatible with Samsung watches as they run Tizen operating system, not Android Wear which this app requires. Please contact us via email to arrange a refund. Thanks.

author: David Pauling
comment: Simple to use. Ideal and quick whilst playing a match.
title: Perfect

author: Ryan Fobart
comment: Simple scoring is nonfunctional. You can press and swipe in every way possible until the end of time and you will randomly, very occasionally see a response from the app. If it also happens to add the score to the side you wanted it to then go play the lotto because it's your lucky day.

reply.author: PumpkinTechLabs
reply.content: Hi Ryan. Thanks for getting in touch. I'm very sorry to hear about your experience. We are aware of the issue with simple scoring and working to get it resolved ASAP. Please note in free version simple scoring scores up to a maximum of 10 points. Unlimited simple scoring is available in PRO version.

title: Didn't work...

author: Stuart Richards
comment: Easy to use. Clearly shows score. Lots of sports to choose from. I use it whilst playing tennis 🎾 and squash.
title: Works fantastically

author: Christian Bazin
comment: Very nice, clean design, easy to use. But I can't get the Simple Scoring to work on the Moto 360 (1st gen). It would be nice if the app would stay open when we force the screen to go black to preserve battery life (will give 5* when added & scoring fixed). The long press to get to the settings is not the most initiative way to get to the settings. I would also like to see the app work on the phone. Could make picking settings easier and would be nice to have the same functionality without the watch. Thanks!

reply.author: PumpkinTechLabs
reply.content: Hi Christian, thanks for the feedback. The bug with simple scoring on the free version will be fixed it in the next release. Preserving battery life and screen is also available in the PRO version of the app. We do realise the need for the app to work on the phone and this feature is in our future pipeline. Thanks again for your feedback!

title: Very nice, clean design

author: Chris Murray
comment: I love this app. It's exactly what I need to log the score and concentrate on the game. Developer was very responsive to suggestions and implemented them very quickly. Highly recommended!
title: The must have scorekeeper for Wear

author: dj eponymous
comment: Does what it says it does. No fuss.
title: Just what I was looking for!

author: Daniel Main
comment: Easy to use and quickly read during a game. I can focus on my game and not have to worry about keeping score.
title: Great app

author: Doug Beall
comment: This is exactly the app I've been waiting for.  I love how simple it is to use, even in the heat if a match.
title: Wow!!

author: Hollie Beall
comment: Works well and smoothly. Makes keeping score much simpler.
title: Nice app!

author: Adele Baker
comment: Never have the hassle of remembering the score ever again! Very easy and simple to use.
title: Love it!
